In England, in the seven days to 08 November, there were 190,449 new confirmed cases (336.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 November, there were 230,870 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 18% (40,421 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 November is 8,084,740 (14,296.6 cases per 100,000 population).
